inti 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Inti package is a collection of different applications and procedures used in plant breeding and experimental designs.

Installation

You can install the released version of inti from CRAN with:

install.packages("inti")

And the development version from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Flavjack/inti")

Shiny apps

Tarpuy

Rticles

Yupana

Github

Yupana

inti::yupana()

Tarpuy

inti::tarpuy()

Rticles

inti::rticles_addin()
